resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158558</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158558</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2600</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Gravitation and free fall of a body</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gravitation und frei Fall eines Körpers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Attraction universelle et librement chute d'un 
corps</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gravitação e livre queda de um corpo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gravitazione e liberamente caduta di un corpo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βαρύτητα και ελεύθερη πτώση ενός σώματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gravitación y libremente caída de un cuerpo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates universal gravitation and its influence on the free fall of a body at different speeds</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">force of gravity</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die Universalgravitation und 
seinen Einfluß auf den freien Fall eines Körpers mit 
unterschiedlichen Geschwindigkeiten zeigt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre l'attraction 
universelle universelle et son influence la chute libre d'un corps à 
différentes vitesses</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre a gravitação 
universal e a sua influência na queda livre de um corpo em 
velocidades diferentes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra la gravitazione 
universale e la relativa influenza sulla caduta libera di un corpo 
alle velocità differenti</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει την καθολική βαρύτητα 
και την επιρροή της στην ελεύθερη πτώση ενός σώματος με τις 
διαφορετικές ταχύτητες</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra la gravitación 
universal y su influencia en la caída libre de un cuerpo a diversas 
velocidades</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft von Schwerkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force de la pesanteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força da gravidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza di gravità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δύναμη της βαρύτητας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerza de la gravedad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>
            <source>statusValues</source>
            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>
            <role>

version:3.0

        </lifeCycle>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>web page</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>

          </typicalAgeRange>
          <context>

        </educational>
        <rights>

            <value>yes</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">edumedia</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>

    </metadata>
